author: rovere
body:
This is a major release for DQMGUI.
- Include the temporary patches that were previously applied at build time directly into the DQMGUI code-base, after they have been tested on pre-production.
- Update ROOT to version 6.06. This is mandatory in order to cope with the upstream(CMSSW) move to the same ROOT release.
- Fix an overlay problem that appeared after the transition to the new ROOT version.
- Fix the fixstreamers command in order to be able to patch whatever entry in the StreamerInfo table. To be used with extreme care.

@BrunoCoimbra @geneguvo
title: DQMGUI 8.3.0
